response.overview: Hairey London Boro Koshto is a drama that depicts the consequences of drug and alcohol abuse among the younger generation. It portrays the social crisis caused by these addictions and emphasizes the importance of youth centers as places for active, meaningful social engagement to prevent teens from wandering the streets. The film also highlights the role of better health education in schools and parental encouragement as key factors in combating these issues. The story aims to raise awareness and suggest remedies for drug and alcohol-related problems among young people, focusing on prevention and support within the community
response.title: Hairey London Boro Koshto
